arguments.summary: read one or more arguments files and add them to the command line
arguments.name: --arguments_file

arguments.summary: Compression level for all compressed files created (e.g. BAM and VCF).
arguments.name: --COMPRESSION_LEVEL

arguments.summary: Whether to create an index when writing VCF or coordinate sorted BAM output.
arguments.name: --CREATE_INDEX

arguments.summary: Whether to create an MD5 digest for any BAM or FASTQ files created.
arguments.name: --CREATE_MD5_FILE

arguments.summary: Google Genomics API client_secrets.json file path.
arguments.name: --GA4GH_CLIENT_SECRETS

arguments.summary: display the help message
arguments.name: --help

arguments.summary: The INPUT VCF or BCF file.
arguments.name: --INPUT

arguments.summary: Filters a VCF file with a javascript expression interpreted by the java javascript engine.  The script puts the following variables in the script context:  'variant' a VariantContext ( https://samtools.github.io/htsjdk/javadoc/htsjdk/htsjdk/variant/variantcontext/VariantContext.html ) and  'header' a VCFHeader ( https://samtools.github.io/htsjdk/javadoc/htsjdk/htsjdk/variant/vcf/VCFHeader.html ). Last value of the script should be a boolean to tell whether we should accept or reject the record.
arguments.name: --JAVASCRIPT_FILE

arguments.summary: The maximum phred scaled fisher strand value before a site will be filtered out.
arguments.name: --MAX_FS

arguments.summary: When writing files that need to be sorted, this will specify the number of records stored in RAM before spilling to disk. Increasing this number reduces the number of file handles needed to sort the file, and increases the amount of RAM needed.
arguments.name: --MAX_RECORDS_IN_RAM

arguments.summary: The minimum allele balance acceptable before filtering a site. Allele balance is calculated for heterozygotes as the number of bases supporting the least-represented allele over the total number of base observations. Different heterozygote genotypes at the same locus are measured independently. The locus is filtered if any allele balance is below the limit.
arguments.name: --MIN_AB

arguments.summary: The minimum sequencing depth supporting a genotype before the genotype will be filtered out.
arguments.name: --MIN_DP

arguments.summary: The minimum genotype quality that must be achieved for a sample otherwise the genotype will be filtered out.
arguments.name: --MIN_GQ

arguments.summary: The minimum QD value to accept or otherwise filter out the variant.
arguments.name: --MIN_QD

arguments.summary: The output VCF or BCF.
arguments.name: --OUTPUT

arguments.summary: Whether to suppress job-summary info on System.err.
arguments.name: --QUIET

arguments.summary: Reference sequence file.
arguments.name: --REFERENCE_SEQUENCE

arguments.summary: display hidden arguments
arguments.name: --showHidden

arguments.summary: One or more directories with space available to be used by this program for temporary storage of working files
arguments.name: --TMP_DIR

arguments.summary: Use the JDK Deflater instead of the Intel Deflater for writing compressed output
arguments.name: --USE_JDK_DEFLATER

arguments.summary: Use the JDK Inflater instead of the Intel Inflater for reading compressed input
arguments.name: --USE_JDK_INFLATER

arguments.summary: Validation stringency for all SAM files read by this program.  Setting stringency to SILENT can improve performance when processing a BAM file in which variable-length data (read, qualities, tags) do not otherwise need to be decoded.
arguments.name: --VALIDATION_STRINGENCY

arguments.summary: Control verbosity of logging.
arguments.name: --VERBOSITY

arguments.summary: display the version number for this tool
arguments.name: --version

description: Applies a set of hard filters to Variants and to Genotypes within a VCF.
name: FilterVcf (Picard)
